info.name: Tesla Vehicle API Test
info.description: Automated tests for vehicle telemetry endpoints ( mocked using public API )

exec: pm.test("Status code is 200", function () { pm.response.to.have.status(200); });
pm.test("Response time is less than 500ms", function () { pm.expect(pm.response.responseTime).to.be.below(500); });
pm.test("Response is JSON", function () {pm.response.to.be.json; });
pm.test("Returns array of 10 Users", function () { var jsonData = pm.response.json(); pm.expect(jsonData).to.be.an('array'); pm.expect(jsonData.length).to.equal(10); });
pm.test("Status code is 200", function () { pm.response.to.have.status(200); });
pm.test("Response time is less than 500ms", function () { pm.expect(pm.response.responseTime).to.be.below(500); });
pm.test("Response is JSON", function () {pm.response.to.be.json; });
pm.test("User ID is 1", function () { pm.expect(JSON.parse(pm.response.text()).id).to.equal(1); });
pm.test("Name is correct", function (){ var jsonData = pm.response.json(); pm.expect(jsonData.name).to.equal("Leanne Graham");  });
pm.test("Status code is 201", function () { pm.response.to.have.status(201); });
pm.test("Response time is less than 500ms", function () { pm.expect(pm.response.responseTime).to.be.below(500); });
pm.test("Response is JSON", function () {pm.response.to.be.json; });
pm.test("Returned ID is an integer > 100", function () { var jsonData = pm.response.json(); pm.expect(jsonData.id).to.be.an('number').and.to.be.above(100); });
pm.test("Status code is 200", function () { pm.response.to.have.status(200); });
pm.test("Response time is less than 500ms", function () { pm.expect(pm.response.responseTime).to.be.below(500); });
pm.test("Response is JSON", function () {pm.response.to.be.json; });
pm.test("Updated ID is 1", function () { var jsonData = pm.response.json(); pm.expect(jsonData.id).to.eql(1); });
pm.test("Status code is 200", function () { pm.response.to.have.status(200); });
pm.test("Response time is less than 500ms", function () { pm.expect(pm.response.responseTime).to.be.below(500); });
pm.test("Response is JSON", function () {pm.response.to.be.json; });
pm.test("Response body is an empty object", function () { var jsonData = pm.response.json(); pm.expect(jsonData).to.be.empty});
pm.test("Status code is 404 - Not Found", function () { pm.response.to.have.status(404); });
pm.test("Response time is less than 500ms", function () { pm.expect(pm.response.responseTime).to.be.below(500); });
pm.test("Status code is 401 - Unauthorized", function () { pm.response.to.have.status(401);});
pm.test("Response time is less than 500ms", function () { pm.expect(pm.response.responseTime).to.be.below(500); });
pm.test("Status code is 200 - Successful", function () { pm.response.to.have.status(200); });
pm.test("Response time is less than 500ms", function () { pm.expect(pm.response.responseTime).to.be.below(500); });
pm.test("Response is JSON", function () { pm.response.to.be.json; });
pm.test("Response body contains 'ELON'", function () { pm.expect(pm.response.text()).to.include('ELON'); });
